alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walker and Winston Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Needmore to Camp McDowell to 6 miles south of Oakman. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Arley, Double Springs, Parrish, Oakman, Addison, Sipsey, Curry, Gorgas Steam Plant, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Smith Dam, Nesmith, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Ashridge and Falls City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
